scripts.clean:all: rimraf packages/**/package-lock.json -g packages/**/node_modules -g packages/**/dist -g apps/**/package-lock.json -g apps/**/node_modules -g apps/**/dist apps/**/dist-web apps/**/dist-desktop apps/**/dist-mobile apps/**/dist-app -g  ./node_modules  ./package-lock.json
scripts.clean:all-metadate: npm run e2e:clean-metadate --workspace=packages/e2e && npm run sanitize-assets --workspace=apps/showcases
scripts.clean:all:restore: git add ./package-lock.json && find packages -type d -name node_modules -prune -false -o -type f -name package-lock.json -exec git add {} +
scripts.clean:install:all: npm install && cd apps/desktop && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.clean:reinstall: npm run clean:all && npm run clean:install:all && npm run clean:all:restore
scripts.prettier:changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTUXB HEAD | grep -E '\.(ts|tsx|js|json|css|md)$' | xargs prettier --write
